task_data.title: Create Missing Grafana Dashboards
task_data.description: Create k3s and Sandfly Grafana dashboards as ConfigMaps
requirements: Create grafana-dashboard-k3s ConfigMap with comprehensive k3s cluster metrics
Create grafana-dashboard-sandfly ConfigMap with security alert metrics
Use existing Cloudflare dashboard as template (grafana-dashboard-cloudflare)
Ensure dashboards auto-import via Grafana sidecar
Verify dashboards appear in Grafana UI

context.pattern: Create ConfigMaps with dashboard JSON, apply to monitoring namespace

test_criteria: k3s dashboard displays cluster metrics (nodes, pods, resources)
ConfigMaps properly labeled for sidecar discovery

context.routing_reason: Pattern-based routing via MoE - development pattern match (create, implement, code)
context.expected_outcome: Two new Grafana dashboards deployed and accessible
